definitions.definition: An Indian plant ( Curcuma longa ), with aromatic rhizomes , part of the ginger family ( Zingiberaceae ).
The pulverized rhizome of the turmeric plant, used for flavoring and to add a bright yellow color to food.
A yellow to reddish-brown dye extracted from the turmeric plant.

main_definition: ( botany ) An Indian plant ( Curcuma longa ), with aromatic rhizomes , part of the ginger family ( Zingiberaceae ).
secondary_definitions: ( cooking ) The pulverized rhizome of the turmeric plant, used for flavoring and to add a bright yellow color to food.
A yellow to reddish-brown dye extracted from the turmeric plant.
